INSERT ALL
INTO LOTTO_HISTORY ( BNUSNO, FIRSTWINAMNT, TOTSELLAMNT, DRWTNO1, DRWTNO2, DRWTNO3, DRWTNO4, DRWTNO5, DRWTNO6, DRWNODATE, DRWNO, FIRSTPRZWNERCO, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( #{item.bnusNo}, #{item.firstWinamnt}, #{item.totSellamnt}, #{item.drwtNo1}, #{item.drwtNo2}, #{item.drwtNo3}, #{item.drwtNo4}, #{item.drwtNo5}, #{item.drwtNo6}, #{item.drwNoDate}, #{item.drwNo}, #{item.firstPrzwnerCo}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
select * from dual
mapper.select: select COUNT(*) AS DRWNO from LOTTO_HISTORY
SELECT BNUSNO, FIRSTWINAMNT, TOTSELLAMNT, DRWTNO1, DRWTNO2, DRWTNO3, DRWTNO4, DRWTNO5, DRWTNO6, DRWNODATE, DRWNO, FIRSTPRZWNERCO, CREATE_DATE FROM LOTTO_HISTORY
SELECT BNUSNO, FIRSTWINAMNT, TOTSELLAMNT, DRWTNO1, DRWTNO2, DRWTNO3, DRWTNO4, DRWTNO5, DRWTNO6, DRWNODATE, DRWNO, FIRSTPRZWNERCO, CREATE_DATE FROM LOTTO_HISTORY WHERE DRWNO = #{drwNo}

SELECT BNUSNO ,FIRSTWINAMNT ,TOTSELLAMNT , DRWTNO1 , DRWTNO2 , DRWTNO3 , DRWTNO4 , DRWTNO5 , DRWTNO6 , DRWNODATE , DRWNO , FIRSTPRZWNERCO , CREATE_DATE FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, B.* FROM (SELECT A.* FROM LOTTO_HISTORY A ORDER BY DRWNO DESC) B) WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{start} + 1) and (#{start} + #{length} + 1)
SELECT COUNT(1) AS COUNT FROM LOTTO_HISTORY

SELECT no NUM, COUNT(*) FREQ FROM (select DRWTNO1 as no FROM LOTTO_HISTORY union all select DRWTNO2 as no FROM LOTTO_HISTORY union all select DRWTNO3 as no FROM LOTTO_HISTORY union all select DRWTNO4 as no FROM LOTTO_HISTORY union all select DRWTNO5 as no FROM LOTTO_HISTORY union all select DRWTNO6 as no FROM LOTTO_HISTORY union all select BNUSNO as no FROM LOTTO_HISTORY) AA GROUP BY no ORDER BY no

SELECT DD, NO, COUNT(*) FREQ from (select DRWTNO1 as no, TO_CHAR(DRWNODATE,'YYYY') as DD FROM LOTTO_HISTORY union all select DRWTNO2 as no, TO_CHAR(DRWNODATE,'YYYY') as DD FROM LOTTO_HISTORY union all select DRWTNO3 as no, TO_CHAR(DRWNODATE,'YYYY') as DD FROM LOTTO_HISTORY union all select DRWTNO4 as no, TO_CHAR(DRWNODATE,'YYYY') as DD FROM LOTTO_HISTORY union all select DRWTNO5 as no, TO_CHAR(DRWNODATE,'YYYY') as DD FROM LOTTO_HISTORY union all select DRWTNO6 as no, TO_CHAR(DRWNODATE,'YYYY') as DD FROM LOTTO_HISTORY union all select BNUSNO as no, TO_CHAR(DRWNODATE,'YYYY') as DD FROM LOTTO_HISTORY) AA group by NO, DD order by DD, NO
SELECT num, freq FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, AA.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(all_nums_freq(12)) ORDER BY FREQ DESC ) AA ) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 5
SELECT num, freq FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, AA.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(all_nums_freq(12)) ORDER BY FREQ ) AA ) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 5
